title: How Donald Trump’s spending bill will boost Silicon Valley’s defence companies
summary: Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill earmarked $300 billion for US military modernization, with billions of dollars already set to go to Peter Thiel’s Anduril and Palantir–in which Stephen Miller owns $100,000 worth of stock
